channel.title: +1 Forward - Firebrands Series - What Have We Learned
channel.description:
https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/1-forward/summer-series-firebrands-what-we-have-learned
Rach and Rich conclude their third Summer Series by reflecting on their experience with Firebrands games.
Timecodes: 0:00:53 - Our First Impressions of Firebrands 0:05:58 - Which Firebrands games did we try out? 0:08:27 - What aspects of Firebrands most surprised us 0:14:11 - Which aspects we found underwhelming 0:23:49 - Advice we offer for first time Firebrands players 0:28:57 - Our Highs 0:34:00 - Our Lows 0:37:20 - Final Thoughts on Firebrands and PbtA
[Firebrands Series Page](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/firebrands-series.html)
